AFTERLIFE.Definition: a life that some people believe begins after death

ATHEIST.Definition: not believing in Gods or the supernatural

BATTLED.Definition: if people battle with an idea, they debate it

CHANTING.Definition: singing or saying a phrase continuously

COFFIN.Definition: a long box in which the body of a dead person is buried

COMMISSION.Definition: to pay for something to happen

CONCEPTION.Definition: the time when a woman falls pregnant

CONFRONT.Definition: face, meet, deal with (often a difficult situation)

CREEP YOU OUT.Definition: if something creeps you out, it makes you uncomfortable

DEPRIVED.Definition: very poor and not having basic amenities

DISCIPLES.Definition: people who believe and follow the ideas of someone else

DISCLAIMER.Definition: a formal statement saying that you don't take responsibility for something

EMBALMED.Definition: (of a body) treated with chemicals to prevent it decaying

EXTRAVAGANT.Definition: costing a lot of money, often more than what is necessary

FORMALDEHYDE.Definition: a chemical used to preserve dead bodies

INEVITABILITY.Definition: something that is certain to happen

KIDNEYS.Definition: the pair of small organs that take waste from the blood

LIVER.Definition: the large organ that cleans the blood

LUCID-TYPE.Definition: (of a dream) feeling real and awake

MEME.Definition: a piece of video or image that spreads quickly on the internet

MEMENTO.Definition: something that helps you remember someone or something

PALLBEARERS.Definition: people who carry a coffin at a funeral

PROPPED UP.Definition: lifted and held in a position

REINCARNATION.Definition: the belief that a dead person's spirit is reborn in another body

SCAVENGERS.Definition: animals that eat other animals that they haven't killed

SLUM.Definition: a very poor and crowded area

SOUL.Definition: the spiritual part of a person that some people believe continues to exist after death

SPIRITUALLY.Definition: relating to your spirit, not your body

TABOO.Definition: a subject or word that is avoided by a society

VULTURES.Definition: large birds that eat dead animals
